item.title: Angular Application Development
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Angular Application Development appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
Angular Application Development

Consider HasoTechnology as your Angular development company to get stable real-time single-page apps and highly effective frontend web and mobile apps. We provide highly scalable, portable, and customized solutions as per your requirement to boost up your sales.

Angular Application

Angular is an open-source framework powered by Google, a web application framework that is broadly used to simplify the process of development.  With our experience and expertise in Angular Development Services and a vast range of other services including the value of web development using Angular. 

We considered all Angular versions as our regular frontal technology with the continuously growing need for interactive web design and applications.  We are adequately developing collective and flexible cross-platform web apps with Angular data-guided, and well-structured.

We have a squad of experienced Angular experts with strong technical expertise. Hire a dedicated Angular developer to expand your end-user experience.

Why choose Angular development services?

Short-term support

Being developed by Google, Angular is an immensely stable framework with huge support within the development community. Its high adoption rate provides getting constant updates and makes this suitable for long-term projects.

MEAN Stack

It is the frontend component of the MEAN stack (MongoDB Express.js, Angular, and Node.js). It is all open-source network that uses JavaScript which can be easily integrated to bring a web application quickly and easily.

Testability

It is designed with app testability from the ground up. It boosts writing easy-to-test code and provides end-to-end testing. Applications built with Angular are well known for their bug-free code and stable operation.

Extensibility

Angular is greatly extensible and works smoothly with other libraries. Each application feature in this can be customized to meet more specific requirements by users.

Supports Multiple Platforms

It supports multiple platforms because in this once code the build it can be reused to develop any app for any other platform of your choice.

Ready-made Solutions

This is built with a rich feature set and ready-made modules to minimize the writing of getters and setters.

What Are The Angular Service We Offer

Single Page Application

Single Page Applications are great when the amount of data is small and the website needs an effective platform. It is a good solution for mobile applications.

eCommerce application

Building of feature-rich and interactive shopping cart is a lot simpler with the help of Angular as it offers effective and powerful eCommerce solutions

3rd party APIs Integration

We provide scalable and high-performance Angular base 3rd party API Integration development services as per your business needs.

Angular application deployment and maintenance

We provide secured maintenance and the latest updates for your Angular systems to stay ahead of the business market.

Configuring Angular apps with AWS / Azure

Our Angular developers can assist you in configuring Angular apps with AWS or Microsoft Azure. Scalable, mobile-friendly, and rich in feature Angular application development.

Technologies We Use For Angular Development Services

Frontend Technologies

  • Angular

Backend Technologies

  • PHP
  • Yii
  • Laravel
  • NodeJS

Data Management

  • MySQL
  • MongoDB
  • Azure SQL

Cloud Computing Platforms

  • Amazon Web Services (AWS)
  • Microsoft Azure

Process We Make For Angular Application

Gather Requirements

Once the application is confirmed, we gather what requirements are needed for the development. It includes the design, client’s requirements, cost, time.

Choose Technology

Choosing technology is the most important task. Because based upon our technology we develop your application. We make sure that we will provide the best technology for your application.

Make mock UI

After getting the required information about the application, we build a dummy model that includes the application’s functionality in all aspects.

Define Rest APIs or Direct Implementation

To make a standardized architecture style for creating a Web Service API we use Rest APIs and sometimes we use direct implementation.

Development

The development of the application according to the client’s needs. We develop applications with creative designs.

Why Choose Haso?

Dedicated Developer Team

We possess sufficient manpower and experience to tackle projects of any complexity for any business size. Based on the demands of a project, we can deploy full-time or part-time developers accordingly.

Quality Assurance

We develop each project as per high technology standards with a dedicated Quality analyst on board to carry out regressions and re-testing before delivery.

Client Satisfaction

Our success lies in your satisfaction. We work on the latest technologies and frameworks to provide you user-friendly business solutions according to your requirements.

On-time delivery

We strictly acquiesce to the settled deadlines while keeping the high-performing software quality.

FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)

We are here to help/assist you find responses to all your questions throughout.

What are all the benefits Angular offers?

There are many benefits of this development and some of them are low development cost, Reduced time to market, Browser compatibility, reusable, REST friendly.

Is angular better than AngularJS?

Each version of Angular has rich benefits, but there is a lot more in being up-to-date with the latest version. Angular is faster than AngularJS and has mobile-driven access that executes better with components, and enables smoother migration from earlier versions.

What is the Cost of Developing an Angular Project?

There is no fixed price. The development cost depends on the project’s size and complexity and the number of features needed in your application.

What is the purpose of AngularJS?

It has the advantage of being able to create highly tested websites and applications. Unit and system testing are supported, which simplifies debugging.

Is Front-end or back-end Angular?

Angular is regarded as a front-end framework, rather than an application framework. You won’t find any of the characteristics of a backend language in its capabilities

Why is Angular popular among developers?

It’s appeal offers a great opportunity to securely tie data to HTML elements. Directives in Angular were used to construct HTML+CSS modules.

Instead of MVC, why not use Angular JS instead?

Compared to ASP.NET MVC, single-page apps, such as Angular, are continually updated with new presentation frameworks and extensions. Angular offers extensive extension and customization, as well as a large and growing community of users.

Is it worth learning angular in 2021?

Learning Angular in 2021 is a good investment of time. developers utilize It as a Javascript framework to construct web, desktop, and mobile apps. Typescript, a superset of Javascript, is used in the development of these apps, along with HTML, CSS, etc.

KEEP IN TOUCH

We would be happy to hear from you, Please fill in the form below or contact

[contact-form-7]

item.title: CMS – Custom Made Software Development
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post CMS – Custom Made Software Development appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
Custom Made Software Development

With our experience, we deliver innovative and high-quality custom-made software(CMS) development services to our customers. HasoTechnology’s application development services solve your technological challenges and design the software according to it.

Custom Made Software

To meet the unique needs of a specific organization, we develop Custom Made Software(CMS) which is the process of designing and building software solutions. HasoTechnology provides custom software development services to deploy highly customized software with speed and quality.

Our expert custom software development services employ the most possible ideas and accurate practices to create custom software development solutions that reveal excellence. Custom software can stand out blockers to understand your service-based business. The key is to solve the right problem and build competitive strength.

Types Of Custom Software Development

Systems Of Custom Software Development

System CMS is used where a large programming library is used to create an app, which degree will a company use, depending on its specific needs and, to a certain extent, budget.

Modern Interface Applications

To decrease repeat code and better focus on developing code that caters to specific business needs utilized by the pre-developed libraries or development code.

Legacy or Fully Custom Software Development

According to the company’s requirements and specifications legacy software is entirely created from scratch.

Services We Provide With Custom Software Development

Custom Web Application Development

We create outstanding web applications. We develop CMS, practical solutions, smart designs, clean code, good architecture, and mostly we are devoted to the success of your company. We’ll develop, design, and support your web application.

Software Development

Your ideas of a technology product meet the most reliable engineering and refined technologies to develop you a software product well defined and derived to transform your concepts into an earnest program driven by the implied most active custom software services that are meant to deliver.

Third-party Customization

Our third-party integration services cover various mediator components and resources with your software solution. Even standalone products with constrained service scope require teaming up with extended service plug-ins and APIs at some point in time so it is important to have third-party integration.

Key Benefits of Custom Made Software

Designed To Your Exact Needs And Specifications

The most advantage implied by software provides is that it is developed to your exact needs. Ready-made software may have some advanced features and it is highly unlikely it will have all the functionalities you’ll need because it is meant to serve an all variety of businesses.

Customized Software Can Be Scaled Easily

Your business can be scaled easily because personalized software is built for specific businesses instead of a wide range, it can easily integrate with business and scale as the brand expands. They can communicate their needs to the custom software development companies they are working with. 

Cost-effective

During the development process, Custom software can be planned and phased. Individual process flows can be automated over time to make development more affordable and available to even the smallest of businesses which are based on the budget and funds available to the company.

Go mobile

Having a mobile responsive design is important for any modern business. CMS software applications are often not adapted to mobile or remote connectivity, but custom software connectivity is given to virtually all devices, increasing the usability without interruption to workflow or processes.

Security

Security is the most basic of all software development. Under some conditions, there is less possibility of security but CMS software is more likely to attract hackers and other unwanted entities can exploit them, making them exposed.

Technologies We Use to Deliver Custom Made Software

Javascript

  • Angular
  • NodeJS

Web Technologies

  • PHP
  • Laravel
  • Magento
  • WooCommerce
  • Yii
  • Framework
  • CodeIgniter

Mobile Technologies

  • Ionic

Database

  • MySql
  • MongoDB
  • WordPress

Process We Make For Angular Application

Gather Requirements

Once the application is confirmed, we gather what requirements are needed for the development. It includes the design, client’s requirements, cost, time.

Choose Technology

Choosing technology is the most important task. Because based upon our technology we develop your application. We make sure that we will provide the best technology for your application.

Make mock UI

After getting the required information about the application, we build a dummy model that includes the application’s functionality in all aspects.

Define Rest APIs or Direct Implementation

To make a standardized architecture style for creating a Web Service API we use Rest APIs and sometimes we use direct implementation.

Development

The development of the application according to the client’s needs. We develop applications with creative designs.

Why Choose Haso?

Dedicated Developer Team

We possess sufficient manpower and experience to tackle projects of any complexity for any business size. Based on the demands of a project, we can deploy full-time or part-time developers accordingly.

Quality Assurance

We develop each project as per high technology standards with a dedicated Quality analyst on board to carry out regressions and re-testing before delivery.

Client Satisfaction

Our success lies in your satisfaction. We work on the latest technologies and frameworks to provide you user-friendly business solutions according to your requirements.

On-time delivery

We strictly acquiesce to the settled deadlines while keeping the high-performing software quality.

FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)

We are here to help/assist you find responses to all your questions throughout.

What Is Custom Software Development?

To meet the specific need of the organization/business Custom software is developed as an individualized software solution. Along with the individual solution, Custom software is developed with unique, innovative solutions with capabilities and features beyond anything provided by a standard or off-the-shelf solution.

Why is customized software developed?

CMS is to speed up and increase the efficiency of your application that can help you boost revenue for your business. On off-the-shelf, you can’t get a high level of efficiency. To help your business gain momentum and competitive advantage the application is customized for a specific group of users.

How much does it cost to make Custom Software Development?

The cost of custom software development depends on your project’s scale and complexity shaped by multiple factors, such as Software type and the number of platforms supported, Number and complexity of software features, Design uniqueness, and complexity, Number and complexity of integrations with other software systems, Infrastructure requirements.

How does it take to complete a project?

The development of a project period purely depends on the requirements but if you are looking for a simple eCommerce website for your store, we can get it delivered in 3 to 4 weeks. In the case of mobile apps, it will be in 5 to 6 weeks your app will be live in the play store/app store.

Do you provide after support?

We will be Your Technology Partner - A Web and Mobile App Development Company There will be 3 months of free support after the delivery of the application if you are taking our support plan for one year. Support includes maintaining the server, any application-related queries if any bugs with real-time data fixes, minor feature development, continuous backup of data, etc.

Is customized software is a type of system software?

For example, custom software development is a system that is tailored to a certain organization’s demand. Although the software is not offered to the public, it is created by internal developers or through a third-party contract. To meet the business’s demands and requirements, the customized software has exclusive rights.

What are the advantages of custom-made software?

  • Tailor-made Solution. 
  • Return on Investment. 
  • Security Concerns. 
  • Flexibility.
  • Compatibility.
  • Easy to Operate.
  • Long-term Risks.

Why do you need custom software?

Innovating using custom software provides your firm an edge over the competition. For example, companies may utilize technology to acquire a competitive edge by boosting overall efficiency or by improving the user experience for their consumers, among other methods.

KEEP IN TOUCH

We would be happy to hear from you, Please fill in the form below or contact

[contact-form-7]

item.title: CRM Software Development
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post CRM Software Development appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
CRM Application Development

To get cover various customer touchpoints and offer customized functionalities that match your business requirements, use a full-featured and customized CRM Software Development.  At HasoTechnology we help you to implement a complete CRM platform that is designed and developed customized just for you.

CRM - Customer Relationship Management

It is a system in which customers’ data was centralized with t and ion/business which can be effectively utilized by multiple divisions within an organization like sales, marketing, customer service, and other support departments.

Improve customer service and sales by enabling multiple divisions to share data, coordinate better and create synergy. Making you adapt your marketing campaigns, the CRM system tracks buyer behavior, interests, and requirements in-depth.

HasoTechnology’s expert CRM developers provide an application that renders the best CRM solutions that help drive better customer interaction and attention by channelizing effective communication between your enterprise and end-users.

Types Of CRM

Before you decide on the approach to create your business-specific app, it is important to learn about its types. Let’s take a look at the various types of CRM systems available.

Strategic CRM

Customers’ voice is important for business thus Strategic CRM which the business puts the customers first. To come up with better value propositions for the customer it collects, divides, and applies information about customers and market trends.

Operational CRM

Operational CRM is centralized to support business processes such as marketing, selling, and services. It includes some automation SalesForce Automation, Marketing Automation, and Service Automation.

Analytical CRM

Analytical CRM stands for the systematic electronic analysis of collated customer data. It also contains internal business data such as Sales Data, Finance Data, and Marketing Data. It provides detailed analytics and customized reports.

Collaborative CRM

Collaborative CRM is of resources and strategies between separate businesses for identifying, acquiring, developing, retaining, and maintaining valuable customers by interacting with them. It is to scenarios, where they can conduct product development, market research, and ting jointly.

What Are The CRM Services We Offer?

Custom CRM Development Solutions

We offer custom CRM development services that secure your marketing campaigns strategy any and increase the number of customers. 

We establish technology that provides direct access to customer information, which is essential for evaluating marketing strategies and customer service processes.

CRM Implementation

Haso’s Custom CRM software developers have the skills to provide high-performing CRM implementation services. To enhance customer engagement and to improve the applications’ performance, we provide you CRM implementation services.

By following the proper preparation and establishing marketing campaigns strategy step-by-step development process and maintenance services, we implement CRM for your application.

CRM Integration Services

To make your website function smoothly we offer CRM integration to build your application. Instead of using customer information based on manual entries, we integrate CRM into your website automation software brings customer information directly into your CRM. 

Highly scalable and performing custom CRM development and Integration services by Haso’s expert CRM developers, here you will find solutions to your every business need.

CRM Mobile Apps

It is easier to connect systems to a variety of users with  CRM mobile applications. Customers prefer Mobile CRM because of its custom relationship management data. Grasping from users’ fondness for mobile CRM, the prevalence of these apps will likely expand steadily.

Key Benefits of CRM Software

Automatic Data Entry

The main advantage of CRM is automatic data entry with this your team will never have to spend time logging emails, calls, meetings, and interactions all of this information will be automatically collected and assembled within the system.

Efficiency

The manual process can be replaced with a well-implemented CRM system which creates significant organizational inefficiencies. Not only do CRM systems create efficiency but also by reducing the use of inefficient processes.

Organize Contact Data

Every contact, no matter their buyer’s journey stage CRM allows your team to keep them tracked. The team will be able to see if a contact visited your company website, downloaded content from the site, or spoke with another member of your sales team already.

Scale Your Sales Processes Over Time

CRM will provide your sales team centralized to keep track of leads, prospects, and customers over any duration of time and allow you to review specific activities like emails, calls, and meetings booked.

Increases Customer Revenues

CRM data assures an effective marketing campaigns strategy and makes it possible to filter the data and establish promotions to those who haven’t purchased particular products. 

Process We Make For CRM Application Development

Gather Requirements

Once the application is confirmed, we gather what requirements are needed for the development. It includes the design, client’s requirements, cost, time.

Choose Technology

Choosing technology is the most important task. Because based upon our technology we develop your application. We make sure that we will provide the best technology for your application.

Make mock UI

After getting the required information about the application, we build a dummy model that includes the application’s functionality in all aspects.

Define Rest APIs or Direct Implementation

To make a standardized architecture style for creating a Web Service API we use Rest APIs and sometimes we use direct implementation.

Development

The development of the application according to the client’s needs. We develop applications with creative designs.

Why Choose Haso?

Dedicated Developer Team

We possess sufficient manpower and experience to tackle projects of any complexity for any business size. Based on the demands of a project, we can deploy full-time or part-time developers accordingly.

Quality Assurance

We develop each project as per high technology standards with a dedicated Quality analyst on board to carry out regressions and re-testing before delivery.

Client Satisfaction

Our success lies in your satisfaction. We work on the latest technologies and frameworks to provide you user-friendly business solutions according to your requirements.

On-time delivery

We strictly acquiesce to the settled deadlines while keeping the high-performing software quality.

FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)

We are here to help/assist you find responses to all your questions throughout.

Which industry Uses CRM?

  • Retail Industry
  • Banking
  • Hotels
  • Financial Services
  • Insurance
  • Consulting

How much time will a custom CRM software project take to complete?

The time taken to complete the project depends on the requirements of your business. Once you hire a developer for CRM services, we will provide an estimated time frame after thoroughly analyzing your business objectives.

When it comes to CRM, is SQL the same thing as CRM?

It is possible to store enormous quantities of data in a CRM system that uses SQL. As compared to certain proprietary CRM databases that use proprietary database engines, Microsoft SQL, Oracle, and MySQL offer significantly superior performance.

Why should I choose custom CRM development?

Custom CRM software enables you to get detailed insights into your business, evaluate your market, tailor your marketing and sales strategies, automate your marketing workflow, and use advanced reporting tools for forecasting and analysis.

What sort of database is it?

In order to effectively manage your contacts, a CRM (customer relationship management) database might be used. The fact that many of these databases are hosted in the cloud means that teams may access contact information at any time and from any location. The fact that CRMs are one of the most popular sales tools should come as no surprise to anyone who uses them.

What is a CRM strategy, and why is it important?

Using a mix of procedures, activities, and technology, a Customer Relationship Management (CRM) strategy aims to increase sales and enhance customer service.

What makes a good customer relationship management system (CRM)?

A good CRM makes it easier to collect and analyze your data, which is why it’s so important. The ability to obtain real-time data should be simple so that you can react swiftly to unforeseen situations quicker Your reports should be customizable so that you may examine historical sales patterns, refocus current efforts, and develop a stronger plan.

KEEP IN TOUCH

We would be happy to hear from you, Please fill in the form below or contact

[contact-form-7]

item.title: DevOps Development
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post DevOps Development appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
DevOps

Our services on DevOps development, improve the quality of software solutions and build cross-functional development teams driven by collaboration.
HasoTechnology provides a complete server setup, setting up continuous integration and continuous deployment and monitoring the server.

DevOps Development

DevOps stands for Development Opportunities, quality, and functionality. Application development from DevOps helps to reduce infrastructure management complexity.

You can enhance software supply speed and increase the team’s productivity by using agile DevOps. With Haso’s DevOps expert developers, we provide applications with high scalable and better performance.

HasoTechnology provides services to customers, that include many capabilities like iterative and incremental development, on-demand task management, lightweight architecture, safety, and automatic testing methodologies.

Why Do We Need DevOps Application?

Maximize Efficiency with Automation

Greater efficiency can speed up and make the development process less susceptible to errors. DevOps tasks can be automated. Continuous server integration automates the code testing process and reduces the needed level of manual effort.

Reduced Human Errors

By using numerous iterations, DevOps lowers the risks of human mistakes during the process of development and operations. Decrease the application failure rate in a given timeline with several applications in the process.

Reduced Time

A major argument for DevOps is that your product can be deployed more quickly with simplified procedures, appropriate automation, methodical release planning, and more. Faster marketing time implies that you can outdo your competition.

Customer Satisfaction

DevOps assists businesses in enhancing customer happiness, innovation, and digital transformation, adaptability, and fostering mutual understanding across corporate divisions.

Better resource management

Developers and testing companies are continuously awaiting resources during the application and software development phases to cause delivery delays. Agile with DevOps means that app development is considerably faster than existing operations throughout the testing phase.

What Services do We Provide?

Integration and Deployment

With continuous integration, our experts offer efficient DevOps development solutions. We ensure that every software change is automatically implemented into production through continuous deployment. To provide excellent service with accuracy, we employ agile techniques.

eCommerce DevOps Solution

DevOps methodology functions as a bridge between the development team and the operations team. With haso’s expertise, you’ll be able to achieve the goal of frequent and fast deployment in close alignment to customer requirements, DevOps focuses on improved communication, collaboration, and performance.

SaaS DevOps

With SaaS DevOps, we provide software that achieves strategic goals faster and offers a better user experience. Standing out in the competitive SaaS market with DevOps. We provide the SaaS application with high performance and scalability.

DevOps Consulting Services

You may improve the development process of your DevOps with us. We will guide you about the newest technology and assess your company’s needs so that you can get creative results. We are responsible for evaluation, general management, and automation.

Technologies We Use to Deliver eCommerce Services

Javascript

  • Angular
  • Node.Js

Web Technologies

  • PHP
  • Laravel
  • Magento
  • Woocommerce
  • Yii Framework
  • CodeIgniter

Mobile Technologies

  • Ionic

Database

  • MySql
  • MongoDB
  • WordPress

Process We Make For Mobile Application

Gather Requirements

Once the application is confirmed, we gather what requirements are needed for the development. It includes the design, client’s requirements, cost, time.

Choose Technology

Choosing technology is the most important task. Because based upon our technology we develop your application. We make sure that we will provide the best technology for your application.

Make mock UI

After getting the required information about the application, we build a dummy model which includes the functionality of the application in all aspects.

Define Rest APIs or Direct Implementation

To make a standardized architecture style for creating a Web Service API we use Rest APIs and sometimes we use direct implementation.

Development

The development of the application according to the client’s needs. We develop E-commerce applications with creative designs.

Why Choose Haso For DevOps Application?

Dedicated Developer Team

We possess sufficient manpower and experience to tackle projects of any complexity for any business size. Based on the demands of a project, we can deploy full-time or part-time developers accordingly.

Quality Assurance

We develop each project as per high technology standards with a dedicated Quality analyst on board to carry out regressions and re-testing before delivery.

Client Satisfaction

Our success lies in your satisfaction. We work on the latest technologies and frameworks to provide you user-friendly business solutions according to your requirements.

On-time delivery

We strictly acquiesce to the settled deadlines while keeping the high-performing software quality.

Testimonials

The young team’s fresh and creative ideation enabled them to listen well and deliver on-site goals and vision. Their responsive communication and cost-effectiveness earned further trust.

Bala murugan Managing Director, Siva Groups

HasoTechnology delivered both projects successfully. In addition to their technical and business knowledge, the team is characterized by open-mindedness and a strong commitment to service.

Subbramanian Meenakshisundaram, Managing Partner, Balanetra Technologies

The website is smooth and intuitive; the clients are pleased. HasoTechnology has a young team that is still learning, but that makes up for it with their creative approach to development and project management. They respond quickly and take suggestions well

item.title: Ecommerce

item.content:encoded:
Ecommerce

Improve your customer’s Engagement through highly interactive eCommerce applications.We develop eCommerce applications for all types of business. We also make custom eCommerce applications.

eCommerce Application Development

Due to technological expansion, the eCommerce industry is growing at an unbelievable rate over the last few years. People have shown interests in eCommerce apps as it saves their precious time and helps them get their desired product anywhere and anytime.

Running an offline business brings you success but, taking your business online through an eCommerce app is a new, trendy, and profitable way these days. You will get a vast number of benefits such as broad customer reach, increase ROI by developing an eCommerce app.

Haso’s experts are familiar with all the convolution of developing a mobile app and the latest eCommerce trends. Hence as an eCommerce app development company, we can deliver eCommerce development solutions that improve your business reach, efficiency, profitability, and customer retention.

Our on-site eCommerce expert services team has a wide range of experience with the development and implementation of models. We’ve experienced in deploy your solution with high performing and scalable to meet your exact specification.

Types eCommerce Application

It is important to learn about their types before you decide on the approach to create your business-specific app. It is necessary for your business strategy that will help define your value proposition, target audience, and revenue streams.

Business to business (B2B) eCommerce Application

Selling, Buying, and Trading of products or services between one business to another business will be done on the B2B eCommerce application.

Business to Consumer (B2C) eCommerce Application

Retailer or a marketplace that offers products or services to the customers is the main focus of B2B eCommerce application.

Customer to Customer (C2C ) eCommerce Application

Customers can directly sell products to another customer without any need for a middleman transaction can be done in the C2C eCommerce application.

Customer to Business (C2B ) eCommerce Application

Customer who wants to provide services or products to an organization/business can be done through C2B eCommerce application.

Marketplace eCommerce Applications We Can Make?

eCommerce Web Application

We make an eCommerce Web Application for your business. We develop eCommerce websites that are highly engageable and user-friendly for various business sectors

eCommerce Mobile Application

By using a native or hybrid application framework as per your business needs we deliver engaging, immersive, and secure eCommerce Mobile application solutions for both android and ios.

Custom eCommerce Application

Get an appealing and engaging website Design to advantage youreCommerce project and move ahead of the rest of competitors by customizing your eCommerce application.

eCommerce Marketplace Development

We offer eCommerce marketplace development services for businesses running on multi-vendor selling models.

Woocommerce

We offer customer-focused, brand-centric, and sales-optimized WooCommerce websites that give your eCommerce business a huge success.

  • Yii Framework

  • WordPress

Marketplace We Use For eCommerce

Easy to interact with.

Boosting up the sales through online promotions.

Reaching the customers easily.

Faster and easy product browsing than a website.

Quick and verified payment option.

A fuss-free service for the customers.

Once the application is confirmed, we gather what requirements are
needed for the development. It includes the design, client’s
requirements, cost, time.

our technology we develop your application. We make sure that we will
provide the best technology for your application.

After getting the required information about the application, we build a
dummy model which includes the functionality of the application in all
aspects.

Define Rest APIs or Direct Implementation

To make a standardized architecture style for creating a Web Service
API we use Rest APIs and sometimes we use direct implementation.

Development

develop eCommerce applications with creative designs.

Why Haso For eCommerce Application?

We possess sufficient manpower and experience to tackle projects of
any complexity for any business size. Based on the demands of a
project, we can deploy full-time or part-time developers accordingly.

Quality Assurance

We develop each project as per high technology standards with a
dedicated Quality analyst on board to carry out regressions and
re-testing before delivery.

Client Satisfaction

high-performing software quality.

Testimonials

The young team’s fresh and creative ideation enabled them to listen well and deliver on-site goals and vision. Their responsive communication and cost-effectiveness earned further trust.

Bala murugan Managing Director, Siva Groups

item.title: eCommerce Integration With Lazada & Shopee
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post eCommerce Integration With Lazada & Shopee appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
eCommerce Integration With Lazada & Shopee

To reach more customers and make your eCommerce site get high traffic, make eCommerce integrate to your site with eCommerce platforms like Lazada and Shopee. With HasoTechnology’s expert developers we integrate your eCommerce site.

Lazada and Shopee Integration

Lazada and Shopee are some of the best eCommerce platforms. eCommerce Integration to your eCommerce site with these Platforms make your site reach its target customers. This allows you to gain more control over your online shopping sites. 

The integration process becomes easy and quick with the Lazada and Shopee integration solution. You will be able to automate order processing as well as smoothly manage your store. Hire HasoTechnology’s expert developer to get your eCommerce site integrated with Lazada and Shopee.

What Is eCommerce API Integration?

eCommerce integration will automatically sync your accounting, inventory, sales, and marketing to the eCommerce Platform. By integrating your online shopping site with the eCommerce Platform you can sell your product on more than one platform like Lazada and Shopee.

On integration, you just need to upload your product on one platform which automatically gets synced and published on other platforms. It is easy to manage your stack, sales, marketing by this integration. For those who want more customers and want to be a more recognized site, they must integrate their site.

Why Need eCommerce Integration?

Saves Time

Since the integration automatically syncs the products it saves time and errors. eCommerce integration saves a lot of time for retailers by providing them a platform where they can keep track of the records of the movement of the products from the warehouse till it reaches the customers.

Highly Securable

eCommerce integration is highly secured cause orders placed on your website will be automatically transferred to your system in real-time and without any manual support and resist duplicate data entry.  It’s fast, consistent, and error-free.

Easy To Maintain

After integrating the website and web store in the same system means you don’t need a large development team to make quick changes. Whenever you want you can log in and update products and content yourself. This makes it easier for maintenance.

Better Customer Services

Your customer has more transparency of the operations like tracking, inventory, and so on after integration. This gives them trust and a more involved feel and in turn, offers credibility to your company.

Saves Money

It automatically gives you web sales information from time to time, it allows you to forecast and plan the inventory accordingly and more accurately. With the integrated eCommerce software, you can have the benefits of error-free data and keep on time on manual information submission.

What Are The Key Feature Of This Integration?

Automatic Sync On Sales & Inventory

Integration to Shopee and Lazada leads you to control the inventory from one place and have it synced across all the channels. Across the channels, your online orders and stock balance are automatically synced.

Stock Balance

With an automated process stock levels across online stores will be 100%  accurate. If the stock is maintained balanced there is no more overselling and underselling.

E-mail Notification

Get an email alert as soon as you receive any new orders on Lazada and Shopee. Stay updated with email notifications and receive regular updates of new and rejected orders.

Technologies We Use to Deliver eCommerce Integration

Javascript

  • Angular
  • NodeJS

Web Technologies

  • PHP
  • Laravel
  • Magento
  • WooCommerce
  • Yii
  • Framework
  • CodeIgniter

Mobile Technologies

  • Ionic

Database

  • MySql
  • MongoDB
  • WordPress

Process We Make For eCommerce Integration

Gather Requirements

Once the application is confirmed, we gather what requirements are needed for the development. It includes the design, client’s requirements, cost, time.

Choose Technology

Choosing technology is the most important task. Because based upon our technology we develop your application. We make sure that we will provide the best technology for your application.

Make mock UI

After getting the required information about the application, we build a dummy model that includes the application’s functionality in all aspects.

Define Rest APIs or Direct Implementation

To make a standardized architecture style for creating a Web Service API we use Rest APIs and sometimes we use direct implementation.

Development

The development of the application according to the client’s needs. We develop applications with creative designs.

Why Choose Haso?

Dedicated Developer Team

We possess sufficient manpower and experience to tackle projects of any complexity for any business size. Based on the demands of a project, we can deploy full-time or part-time developers accordingly.

Quality Assurance

We develop each project as per high technology standards with a dedicated Quality analyst on board to carry out regressions and re-testing before delivery.

Client Satisfaction

Our success lies in your satisfaction. We work on the latest technologies and frameworks to provide you user-friendly business solutions according to your requirements.

On-time delivery

We strictly acquiesce to the settled deadlines while keeping the high-performing software quality.

FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)

We are here to help/assist you find responses to all your questions throughout.

Most beneficial Shopee and Lazada Seller are in?

Countries in Southeast Asia like Indonesia, Vietnam, Thailand, the Philippines, Malaysia, and Singapore can be the best place to start selling to gain maximum benefits.

Benefits of integrating Lazada and Shopee with your site?

One great way to increase the visibility of your Shopee shop, boost sales, immediately grow traffic & gain buyer trust is by linking your Lazada and Shopee shop to your site.

How will the eCommerce integration boost up the traffic?

After integration, the visibility of your site will be increased along with customer usage will gradually increase. Thus it will boost up your site.

How does API works?

API is the messenger that delivers your request to the provider that you’re requesting it from and then delivers the response back to you.

Should your eCommerce be integrated?

You can operate from one place since it incorporates the functions of production, inventories, orders, financials, customer relationship management (CRM), and other similar features into one huge system. Not only can it assist with internal communications, but it may aid increase income.

Do you have access to Shopee's API?

Powerful API and push  webhook functionality

It comes with a robust API that lets you handle nearly anything from items to shipping to orders.

Why is it necessary to have an eCommerce platform?

Ecommerce platforms provide clients their first impression of an organization and allow firms to deliver tailored representations of some of their accessible material, as well as operate more agilely, according to Kingstone’s analysis of the technology.

What are the benefits of using fully integrated eCommerce platforms?

  • Provides a superior product and service.
  • Up-to-date information and inventory management.
  • Amplify the customer’s journey.
  • Delivery of orders on time.
  • Budgeting and money.
KEEP IN TOUCH

item.title: Lamp Stack Development
item.dc:creator: admin

item.content:encoded:
Lamp Stack Development

It will be a smart move to utilize the LAMP development to stay on top of the technological bar. To avoid any slowdown in your business due to technology, HasoTechnology’s expertise offers you a LAMP Stack development. We develop a Lamp stack application that is deeply personalized as per your digital marketing and branding needs.

Lamp Stack

LAMP is one solution that held the power of four different components (Linux, Apache, MySQL, and PHP) to help build high-performance websites and responsive applications. It’s an open-source web platform that offers a powerful alternative to your domain platforms. 

The most heavily coded websites and complex eCommerce solutions can be easily handled by LAMP stack development services today while enabling the developers to benefit from an adaptable development condition.

Our LAMP Stack Development team delivers the results within the given time limit with costs to suit every budget. Our team of expert LAMP Stack developers is experienced in different technologies and is accomplished by delivering high-quality results within a rapid turnaround time.

Our LAMP Web Services

MySql

MySql scripting to construct a website which is inquired to stores details. MySQL usually sits on top of the Linux layer alongside Apache/layer. In high-end configurations, a separate host server can be offloaded by MySQL. The data-storage side of the LAMP system is MySql. 

PHP database

PHP database is a programming language that is simple and efficient for all the other parts of the LAMP system. We use PHP to write dynamic content capable of accessing the data in the MySQL database and some features which are provided by Linux.

Open-Source Alternatives Are

  • LEMP (Linux, NGINX, MySQL/MariaDB, PHP/Perl/Python)
  • LAPP (Linux, Apache, PostgreSQL, PHP)
  • LEAP (Linux, Eucalyptus, AppScale, Python)
  • LLMP (Linux, Lighttpd, MySQL/MariaDB, PHP/Perl/Python)

LAMP Stack Solution We Offer

Most LAMP Stacks are used to handle heavy code websites & complex solutions today while enabling the developers to benefit from an adaptable development condition. LAMP Stack Development Services.

E-commerce websites

CMS development 

Enterprise application

LAMP server development 

CRM application development

Custom Web application 

Third-party integration services 

Key Benefit Of LAMP

Scalability

Any app or website you build can grow in size or shrink depending on your requirement with this stack development. Make your blog more user-friendly since you have the key in your hands.

Customization

The application would be able to customize the app according to the user. With LAMP,  customization is never going to be an issue and you can get it done within a few steps.

Fast Development

You can develop the application in a faster manner Since there are many options available. So, developers need not worry much about the time since everything is going to take place in a faster manner.

Independent Platform

Along with different platforms such as Windows, Android, iOS, and Linux, You can use operating systems (OS). To get the maximum benefits out of it, You can join independent platforms.

Highly secure

Since there are several updates, encryptions, security architecture, and much more in this stack, we can assure you that this technology is very safe.

Process We Make For LAMP Stack Application

Gather Requirements

Once the application is confirmed, we gather what requirements are needed for the development. It includes the design, client’s requirements, cost, time.

Choose Technology

Choosing technology is the most important task. Because based upon our technology we develop your application. We make sure that we will provide the best technology for your application.

Make mock UI

After getting the required information about the application, we build a dummy model that includes the application’s functionality in all aspects.

Define Rest APIs or Direct Implementation

To make a standardized architecture style for creating a Web Service API we use Rest APIs and sometimes we use direct implementation.

Development

The development of the application according to the client’s needs. We develop applications with creative designs.

Why Choose Haso?

Dedicated Developer Team

We possess sufficient manpower and experience to tackle projects of any complexity for any business size. Based on the demands of a project, we can deploy full-time or part-time developers accordingly.

Quality Assurance

We develop each project as per high technology standards with a dedicated Quality analyst on board to carry out regressions and re-testing before delivery.

Client Satisfaction

Our success lies in your satisfaction. We work on the latest technologies and frameworks to provide you user-friendly business solutions according to your requirements.

On-time delivery

We strictly acquiesce to the settled deadlines while keeping the high-performing software quality.

FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)

We are here to help/assist you find responses to all your questions throughout.

What is LAMP stack and mean stack?

In the MEAN stack, every piece of code is JavaScript. But, in this stack, the server-side is coded in PHP and the client-side in JavaScript. A query is sent using MySQL, which is unlike the MEAN stack.

What are non-open source alternatives for LAMP?

  • WAMP (Windows, Apache, MySQL/MariaDB, PHP/Perl/Python)
  • WIMP(Windows, Internet Information Services, MySQL/MariaDB, PHP/Perl/Python)
  • MAMP (Mac OS x, Apache, MySQL/MariaDB, PHP/Perl/Python).

What is the LAMP stack used for?

Lamp stack is open-source software that is used for web application development. 

  • web application to work smoothly
  • Webserver   
  • Database 
  • programming language.

Why is the LAMP stack so widely adopted?

A web application delivery platform that was one of the earliest open-source software stacks for the web and continues to be one of the most popular methods of delivering web apps Considering its popularity, you’ll probably run into it a lot when you upgrade or host existing apps in the course of your professional life.

Between LAMP and LEMP, what is the main difference?

All that differs is a difference in web server software. A LAMP stack uses Apache as a web server, while a LEMP stack uses Nginx (Engine X). Both web servers work differently and require separate setups to get them up and running. They are not interchangeable.

Is Python a better choice than PHP?

It’s best to use Python for long-term projects. This programming language has a short learning curve, and it’s easy to get started with it. As a result, Python’s indentation enforcers are extremely rigorous. So it’s much easier to read than PHP.

Are all the lamps stacked neatly in one place?

LAMP is a Full Stack paradigm for web service stacks that is widely adopted.

What will be the demand for a full-stack developer in 2021?

Since last year, the demand for full-stack developers has risen by 30 percent, and it’s expected to be one of the hottest careers in 2021.

KEEP IN TOUCH

We would be happy to hear from you, Please fill in the form below or contact

item.title: Magento eCommerce Application Development

item.content:encoded:
Magento eCommerce Application Development

Expect highly reliable, high-quality, smart, scalable, seamless, and comprehensive Magento eCommerce development services with experts. HasoTechnology’s experts develop the eCommerce application with Magento according to your business need. To get developed contact us.

Magento Application

It provides the advantage of high-end scalability to e-Commerce websites and boundless room to customize it according to the enterprise needs and requirements. Highly powerful marketing, SEO, and catalog-management tools are offered by Magento open-source technology.

At HasoTechnology, with expert Magento developers, we deliver web projects that surpass client’s imaginations with the right technology as well as in-depth industry-specific knowledge. We have expertise in developing solutions to your technical needs that help you reflect on your modern technical difficulties.

Why is Magento a Perfect Choice for eCommerce?

Largest Open Source eCommerce Platform

It is an open-source software in which Community Edition (CE) is completely free. Therefore you can easily install and use any version of Magento CE. You can boost up the performance of your Magento online store and also promote your eCommerce website with new features and functionalities by developing Magento modules.

Multitasking

The best thing about Magento is you work on other important tasks simultaneously while monitoring your Magento performance because it allows you to perform multiple tasks at the same time, which saves your precious time.

High Performance

It is one of the leading platforms of e-commerce with regards to page load time, query processing time, and other dynamic or static operations. It ensures your website that has the optimum performance while using minimal server resources.

Largest support community

Due to the selfless devotion of the Magento Community, that’s why Magento for eCommerce enjoys a powerful position amongst its competitors. Dedicated developers, programmers, around the world, are ready to help and work with the Magento Community which provides huge support.

Flexibility

Complete control of all the functions of your eCommerce website is under the developers. Due to its flexibility, Magento developers can always develop a unique and stunning user experience based on multiple device access. You get the opportunity to customize the back-end of the Magento web store to meet specific requirements.

Magento eCommerce Development Services We Provide

Custom Magento Development

We build custom Magento websites that include designed functionalities and meet your business needs. After analyzing your requirements and the business ecosystem then we come up with the best solutions for you. Our developers integrate the best payment methods, modules, and extensions.

Multi-vendor eCommerce Development

A multi-vendor e-commerce website in which multiple vendors sell their products on a single site. Our developers can develop an online marketplace website for your business like Shopify etc., by holding the full capacity of the Magento e-commerce platform. With our experience, we will create the best shopping experience for your customers.

Customized Website Design

Our team makes a beautiful and extraordinary user interface design with fluent navigation by creating passages for the visitor. We customize the website design which is highly responsive and can give a superior and engaging time.

Magento Web Development

Open-source Magento to offer 3rd party integrations for Magento CE and EE, ERP and POS integrations with Magento site, multi-vendor implementation, and migration services can be explored by our experts.

Magento Website Management

Along with the functional upgrades that are available at the professional desk of Magento, We offer real-time management of your website. We have a team of dedicated Magento developers with adequate experience and expertise to manage your Magento website.

Process We Make For Magento eCommerce Development

Gather Requirements

Once the application is confirmed, we gather what requirements are needed for the development. It includes the design, client’s requirements, cost, time.

Choose Technology

Choosing technology is the most important task. Because based upon our technology we develop your application. We make sure that we will provide the best technology for your application.

Make mock UI

After getting the required information about the application, we build a dummy model that includes the application’s functionality in all aspects.

Define Rest APIs or Direct Implementation

To make a standardized architecture style for creating a Web Service API we use Rest APIs and sometimes we use direct implementation.

Development

The development of the application according to the client’s needs. We develop applications with creative designs.

Why Choose Haso?

Dedicated Developer Team

We possess sufficient manpower and experience to tackle projects of any complexity for any business size. Based on the demands of a project, we can deploy full-time or part-time developers accordingly.

Quality Assurance

We develop each project as per high technology standards with a dedicated Quality analyst on board to carry out regressions and re-testing before delivery.

Client Satisfaction

Our success lies in your satisfaction. We work on the latest technologies and frameworks to provide you user-friendly business solutions according to your requirements.

On-time delivery

We strictly acquiesce to the settled deadlines while keeping the high-performing software quality.

FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)

We are here to help/assist you find responses to all your questions throughout.

What does a Magento developer do?

To developing, improving, and maintaining eCommerce websites, you need Magento developers. The responsibility is huge at the time and can even generate a lot of revenues.

Why should I use Magento for building an e-commerce store?

It is one of the most widely used e-commerce platforms in the world. Some of the biggest global companies use Magento for their e-com stores. This is because It is the most flexible and widely supported eCommerce platform. It also provides a lot of options for the customers to customize their stores.

How much does it cost to build a Magento eCommerce platform?

The cost of custom software development depends on your project’s scale and complexity shaped by multiple factors, such as Software type and the number of platforms supported, Number and complexity of software features, Design uniqueness, and complexity, Number and complexity of integrations with other software systems, Infrastructure requirements.

Why is Magento a good eCommerce platform?

Magento is the best multi-channel eCommerce platform as it is fast, optimized, and user-friendly. The competition is increasing and online sales are reaching the skies. To make the most of your Magento store and gain a competitive advantage, you can go for CRM for eCommerce and streamline all your business processes.

How does Magento eCommerce work?

eCommerce platform Magento is built on open source technology and offers merchants a versatile shopping cart system and full control over the appearance, content, and operation of their online store. Magento delivers strong marketing, SEO, and catalog management features.

Is Magento free of cost?

It is a Opensource for free. An open-source platform that’s free to use and extendable according to your preferences. In addition, Opensource users have access to a wide selection of extensions, themes, and community assistance.

Is learning Magento a good idea?

If you want to build an online store, learning Magento eCommerce is a good idea. Shopkeepers may sell their items online using Magento, which is a great piece of software. You may use it to aid merchants with the design and functionality of their e-commerce websites. It’s a feature-rich, open-source solution.

Is Magento developed in a specific programming language?

PHP programming language. It is developed in PHP and utilizes the Zend framework and the model-view-controller architecture to achieve its goals.

KEEP IN TOUCH

item.title: MEAN Stack Development
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post MEAN Stack Development appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
MEAN Stack Development

Make use of the major advantages of MEAN Stack with our experts. Get a mean stack application that is quicker, smarter, better. With the added value to your Web application, HasoTechnology’s expert MEAN stack development team meets all your business demands.

MEAN Stack

MEAN Stack is a Javascript-based framework that developers frequently use to construct high-performance and durable Hybrid websites. It consists of MongoDB, Express.JS, Angular JS, and Node.JS, four strong platforms.

These 4 platforms are very effective for the design of the front end and back end of a website, which greatly enhances web applications’ functionality and responsiveness.

It is the company market’s new go-to technology only for people that aim to provide trustworthy, responsive online applications and to be scalable. We can create websites and web apps for your business with our competent Stack developers.

Our Mean Stack developers on many platforms are competent. Our extended expertise in Stack development services enables us to rapidly build customized solutions for major businesses and start-ups. Following our client’s requirements, we develop a MEAN JavaScript-based application.

Our MEAN Web Services

MongoDB

MongoDB for storage. MongoDB is document-driven, open-source database software that allows you to develop a flexible, scalable foundation. HasoTechnology offers you a highly scalable MongoDB that performs and stores well. It stands out for large data handling as a whole. It may easily be utilized by developers to add fields and conduct their work.

ExpressJS

ExpressJS is a JavaScript-written framework for web servers and mobile applications. It is a lightweight frame with integrated application functionality and helps construct web pages. Development using the NodeJS enhanced capability is simple, minimalistic, scalable, and flexible. With Express, we create single-page, multi-page, hybrid mobile, and online applications.

AngularJS

Get customized web apps with an interactive, user-friendly combination of functions and smooth performance. You will find end-to-end application solutions from HasoTechnology. Our customers benefit from a highly comprehensible, legible, and spontaneous framework built by our developers.

NodeJS

NodeJS for Web Server.NodeJS is a web development framework that is open-source used to construct highly scalable online applications. HasoTechnology supplies you with a web server application that saves significant development time. Node.JS facilitates the deployment of the MongoDB database on a cloud with a built-in web server.

MEAN Stack Solution We Offer

With advantages of MEAN Stack, we provide the following services

MEAN Stack Web Application Development

MEAN Stack Mobile  Application Development

MEAN Stack Application Development

MEAN Stack CMS  Application Development

API integration and development

Why MEAN For Your Business?

Single Language Development

This is mainly caused by the usage of a single language, i.e. on both the client and the server-side, in the development. Because all of these technologies are developed in JavaScript, the procedure is smooth.

JSON (JavaScript Object Notation)

AngularJS and NodeJS are using JSON and MongoDB even saves JSON data. For bigger tasks, it is fantastic. So we utilize JSON for the entire program. The data does not have to be reformatted.

Flexibility

MEAN-based applications allow you to create code for Node and migrate it easily to AngularJS. This flexibility substantially facilitates the programming of MEAN applications.

A free and open-source component

All MEAN stack components are open-source and often updated, allowing developers to adapt their code according to their requirements. And NodeJS offers a rich JavaScript modules library.

Cost-Effective

Deployment costs for a MEAN stack application are lower as the components are free and may work on any host. In this way, front-end frameworks with others may be easily interchanged. The back-end logic and systems are without effect.

Process We Make For MEAN Stack Application

Gather Requirements

Once the application is confirmed, we gather what requirements are needed for the development. It includes the design, client’s requirements, cost, time.

Choose Technology

Choosing technology is the most important task. Because based upon our technology we develop your application. We make sure that we will provide the best technology for your application.

Make mock UI

After getting the required information about the application, we build a dummy model that includes the application’s functionality in all aspects.

Define Rest APIs or Direct Implementation

To make a standardized architecture style for creating a Web Service API we use Rest APIs and sometimes we use direct implementation.

Development

The development of the application according to the client’s needs. We develop applications with creative designs.

Why Choose Haso?

Dedicated Developer Team

We possess sufficient manpower and experience to tackle projects of any complexity for any business size. Based on the demands of a project, we can deploy full-time or part-time developers accordingly.

Quality Assurance

We develop each project as per high technology standards with a dedicated Quality analyst on board to carry out regressions and re-testing before delivery.

Client Satisfaction

Our success lies in your satisfaction. We work on the latest technologies and frameworks to provide you user-friendly business solutions according to your requirements.

On-time delivery

We strictly acquiesce to the settled deadlines while keeping the high-performing software quality.

FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)

We are here to help/assist you find responses to all your questions throughout.

What is a MEAN application?

The phrase MEAN stack refers to a set of JavaScript-based technologies used for web application development. For MongoDB, ExpressJS, AngularJS, and NodeJS, MEAN is an abbreviation. MEAN is a complete JavaScript application from client to server to the database.

Why do we use MEAN stack?

Midstack enables developers to write only one language JavaScript, which means that JavaScript is a simple and quick language both for clients and for servers. Data flows exactly among the JSON layers and requires no rewriting or reformatting because Mean utilizes everywhere the standard JSON data format.

Is MEAN Suitable for Budget-friendly Application Development?

YES, MEAN is an affordable way to develop websites and web apps, because they require a single language only (JavaScript).

Is Mean stack full-stack?

Whereas MEAN stack is an acronym for the whole stack framework, Full stacks relate mostly to the developer. They are both quite popular.

Do MEAN and MERN stack have any differences?

Neither Mean stack nor Mern stack differs greatly from one another. Mean stack employs Angular for front-end web apps, as may be seen from a larger view. React is used in the MERN stack. As far as MongoDB programs go, both are quite efficient.

Is Mean Stack Developer a good choice?

Mean stack developer is an enviable and hard career path to take on. A successful MEAN stack developer is someone who is ready and willing to work on developing a diversified skill set and has expertise working with a wide range of coding languages and applications.

Is the MEAN stack going to be in demand in the future?

According to the report, the demand for Full-Stack Developers has grown by 20 percent in the previous two years. An experienced Full-Stack developer has an extensive understanding of languages such as HTML5, CSS, and javascript.

What is the most popular stack?

MEAN. As a result of its popularity, MEAN is a good representation of Java in the software development sector. All four components of MEAN speak JavaScript Object Notations JSON. That’s the most significant thing about MEAN.

KEEP IN TOUCH

We would be happy to hear from you, Please fill in the form below or contact

[contact-form-7]

The post MEAN Stack Development appeared first on Hasotech.

item.title: NodeJS Application Development
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post NodeJS Application Development appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
NodeJS Application Development

We have a team of professional developers from NodeJS that can effectively construct highly personalizable and scalable applications. We are proud to ensure our solutions go above your needs. Stay ahead of the competition with our NodeJS application development service, tailor-built & scalable.

NodeJS Application

The growing popularity of JavaScript has produced many changes, including major differences in today’s online development. NodeJS has now not only become a JavaScript altercation, but also a mostly based altercation.

NodeJS is a multi-platform and open source technology that implements Javascript code outside the browser. The js technology node has strong corporate support.

NodeJS Architecture has five elements: single thread, event looping, non-blocking I/O, front end, and backend development (backend) development. With the daily improvement of standard codes and characteristics, the technology evolves.

NodeJS provides easy creation of apps with high performance. It helps to simplify the task. It satisfies all our expectations. Changes and maintenance are straightforward.

Our experience is in providing our customers with nodeJS solutions that operate easily across channels. Our skilled developers endeavor to design unique applications that are geared to results.

Key Benefits Of NodeJS

Superior Data Handling

NodeJS enables smooth data interchange between Windows Nonstop to UNIX to the OS X Servers. An efficient background and faster solutions.

Scalability

NodeJS is very scalable for handling impulsive and large programs such as PayPal and so on.

Front-end & Back-end Development

NodeJS may be used to attach front and back-end apps as a Javascript-based technology. NodeJS can be utilized.

Low Development Cost

The NodeJS development costs are quite inexpensive, given their enhanced and sophisticated features and functionality.

High Speed

NodeJS is well known for its speed since it uses one string, instead of using several strings for system acceleration.

Real-Time Web Apps

You may build multi-user Web apps in real-time with incredible authority and convenience in working with the NodeJS environment.

Why NodeJS For Your Application?

NodeJS is concerned with API or web programming in real-time.

You can use NodeJS to develop Amazing & Rich Web apps.

The low-level API is one of the main advantages of NodeJS.

It features a large number of open-source modules driven by a range of areas.

NodeJS programs are extremely scalable and produce huge volumes of traffic.

All of the elements of NodeJS are open source that facilitates replication.

What NodeJS Application We Can make?

The development firm NodeJS can assist you in creating an application and we can create any NodeJS application as needed. The Node Js technology should be recognized first, it is well known for its event-based nature, which handles various I/O and real-time systems. Nodejs is able to accommodate all businesses, from start-ups to every company, from start-ups to small and large corporations.

Process We Make For NodeJS Application

Gather Requirements

Once the application is confirmed, we gather what requirements are needed for the development. It includes the design, client’s requirements, cost, time.

Choose Technology

Choosing technology is the most important task. Because based upon our technology we develop your application. We make sure that we will provide the best technology for your application.

Make mock UI

After getting the required information about the application, we build a dummy model that includes the application’s functionality in all aspects.

Define Rest APIs or Direct Implementation

To make a standardized architecture style for creating a Web Service API we use Rest APIs and sometimes we use direct implementation.

FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)

We are here to help/assist you find responses to all your questions throughout.

What is the cost of building an app using NodeJS?

Different criteria, such as the project requirements, development platform, project complexity, the number of features and functionalities are used to determine the costs of building your NodeJS mobile app. Contact us to discover the cost of developing the project.

How long does a NodeJS Project take to build?

Factors such as the development platform, the complexity of the design, developer experience, functionality and functionality, testing, and much more will be used to determine how much it takes to build NodeJS projects. Please contact us to know the expected timing.

Is NodeJS suitable for machine learning?

NodeJS development may be utilized for any type of application, but its single-threaded nature may not be the ideal way for machine learning. The development of NodeJS is less appropriate for computing heavy work, among which machine learning is one.

What is the most common use of Node JS?

However, it was initially built with real-time push-based architectures in mind. It is typically used for non-blocking, event-driven servers, such as conventional web pages and back-end API services. For example, every browser has its own version of the JS engine.

Is it difficult to learn NodeJS?

JavaScript is at the heart of the Nodejs platform, which determines its complexity level. Due to its simple syntax and interpreted nature, JS is often cited as one of the finest programming languages for beginners.

How safe is node js in comparison to PHP?

Yes, Compared to PHP, it is more secure. There’s no doubt that Nodejs is a fast and lightweight programming language. 

Which is better, Nodejs or Django?

Nodejs excels at developing strong, scalable apps and handling thousands of requests than Django.

How good is NodeJS for backend development?

It is possible that Nodejs is the ideal choice for Back-end development if you are searching for real-time web apps because it includes all of the aforementioned characteristics.
